languages.text: "Дай мне знать, если тебе наскучит простота. Я с удовольствием сделаю твою жизнь много, много сложнее".
"Let me know if you grow tired of things being easy. I would take great pleasure in making your life much, much more difficult."
languages.original_text: "Дай мне знать, если тебе наскучит простота. Я с удовольствием сделаю твою жизнь много, много сложнее".

traits.locale_text: "Let me know if you grow tired of things being easy. I would take great pleasure in making your life much, much more difficult."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Let me know if you grow tired of things being easy. I would take great pleasure in making your life much, much more difficult."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Let me know if you grow tired of things being easy. I would take great pleasure in making your life much, much more difficult."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Let me know if you grow tired of things being easy. I would take great pleasure in making your life much, much more difficult."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “如果你嫌我太好相处，让你觉得无聊的话，不妨直说。我会很乐意变得很难、很难相处。”
languages.original_text: "Let me know if you grow tired of things being easy. I would take great pleasure in making your life much, much more difficult."

traits.locale_text: “如果你嫌我太好相处，让你觉得无聊的话，不妨直说。我会很乐意变得很难、很难相处。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Faites-moi savoir si vous vous lassez de la facilité. Je me ferai un véritable plaisir de vous rendre la vie impossible. »
languages.original_text: "Let me know if you grow tired of things being easy. I would take great pleasure in making your life much, much more difficult."

traits.locale_text: « Faites-moi savoir si vous vous lassez de la facilité. Je me ferai un véritable plaisir de vous rendre la vie impossible. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Sagt Bescheid, wenn Ihr das Leichte leid seid. Es würde mir großes Vergnügen bereiten, Euer Leben viel, viel schwieriger zu gestalten."
languages.original_text: "Let me know if you grow tired of things being easy. I would take great pleasure in making your life much, much more difficult."

traits.locale_text: "Sagt Bescheid, wenn Ihr das Leichte leid seid. Es würde mir großes Vergnügen bereiten, Euer Leben viel, viel schwieriger zu gestalten."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「単調なことに飽き飽きしたら言ってくれ。俺がお前の人生をもっと難しくしてやるよ。楽しみだな」
languages.original_text: "Let me know if you grow tired of things being easy. I would take great pleasure in making your life much, much more difficult."

traits.locale_text: 「単調なことに飽き飽きしたら言ってくれ。俺がお前の人生をもっと難しくしてやるよ。楽しみだな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Si te cansas de que las cosas sean fáciles, avisa. Será un placer hacer que tu vida sea mucho más difícil».
languages.original_text: "Let me know if you grow tired of things being easy. I would take great pleasure in making your life much, much more difficult."

traits.locale_text: «Si te cansas de que las cosas sean fáciles, avisa. Será un placer hacer que tu vida sea mucho más difícil».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Let me know if you grow tired of things being easy. I would take great pleasure in making your life much, much more difficult."

languages.text: "Fazla hoşluktan sıkıldıysan söyle. Hayatını çok ama çok daha zorlaştırmak benim için büyük zevk olur."
languages.original_text: "Let me know if you grow tired of things being easy. I would take great pleasure in making your life much, much more difficult."

traits.locale_text: "Fazla hoşluktan sıkıldıysan söyle. Hayatını çok ama çok daha zorlaştırmak benim için büyük zevk olur."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
